ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 37
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree with the no PvP. This game is about grouping up together and having fun.  I was grouped up with a Bar Rogue, High Elf Bard, Half Elf Paladin, Dwarf
ygData.messageBody:
I agree with the no PvP. This game is about grouping up together and having
fun. I was grouped up with a Bar Rogue, High Elf Bard, Half Elf Paladin,
Dwarf Cleric, and myself in Unrest. What a great place for a lev 15 player
to lev up ! I gained 2 bubbles in about 1and a half hours. It was
constant battling. I was told that there is a 10% exp. bonus with three
people grouped and a 25% exp. bonus for six people grouped. Has anyone
else heard about this ?



Tanaman
